response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly unparalleled in its value and significance. This product holds immense worth to both of us, estimated at $1,200,000. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for exceptional quality. Don't miss out on this unique chance to secure a piece that will not only enrich your collection but also appreciate over time. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
